title: Peculiar Builds
body:
I tried this out in an Aram a week or so back. Since {{champion:67}}  gets bonus movement speed while moving towards enemy champions, what would it be like If you had crazy chase potential but still able to do massive damage. 
This surprisingly worked out pretty well and I even got a pentakill. My items were:
{{item:3277}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3025}} {{item:3035}} 


I want to try something out similar to this in a normal game later.

What other  interesting/weird builds have people done on other champions? and How did it turn out?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=EndlessSorcerer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7ojsJiGI,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-07T19:03:42.831+0000)
>
> I'd probably recommend Statikk Shiv instead of Iceborn Gauntlet in that build.  More attack speed, good crit, and the passive is nice for poke and waveclear.

I wasn't really worried about wave clear. I took iceborn for the aoe slow. With all movement speed from triforce and boots, felt like I was running circles around people~ constantly tumbling. Was rather fun. 

Think I may do that Mundo build if I get him

The thing that's wrong with it is Trinity passive doesn't proc with Iceborn Gauntlet passive: it picks one. 

I suggest either replace trinity with shiv/phantom dancer or replace gauntlet with frozen mallet.

It does both, because Ezeal need it to (though only Trinity's bonus damage applied to the main target).

http://forums.eune.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=652975&highlight=iceborn+trinity+force

This thread seems to support the theory that combining the two lowers the potential damage of Trinity Force but slightly heightens the damage of Iceborn Gauntlet. It hardly seems worth the trade-off to have an AoE slow field for loss of damage, especially as Vayne! I'd still vouch for Fro-Mal over gauntlet for increased damage. : ]

They changed how it works when you have both near the end of season 4... at least I think it was near the end.

It's not just the waveclear.  The Shiv and Trinity Force would bring you up to 30% crit and 70% attack speed, which greatly amplifies your autoattack damage.  Though, I'm wondering if got furor boots as well for kiting?
I always build Magic Pen Mundo when I jungle.
Rammus top lane is quite good vs AD melee.  I like {{item:3153}} {{item:3022}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3075}} {{item:3102}} {{item:3111}}

21 offensive masteries Rammus.

I get the typical items, but now you kill everyone hilariously fast.  Squishy champions practically kill themselves when you taunt them.  Oh, and your autos hit like a truck too, just for being tanky.
